title: Found a Bug with Yorick
body:
Yesterday I was playing as yorick top. My friend was playing Vi Jungle. As he went to gank we got counterganked against Xin. I ulted him just before he died, after he had 'respawned' with my ult, he ulted Xin, He went towards Xin, and as he reached him the Xin stopped moving, however the animation for the Vi ult connecting with Xin didn't work. He looked as if he stopped moving, I believe it might just be the animation.

Sincerely,
ChocChip Cookies

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

The best place to post this would be over on the NA boards [Report a Bug section](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), before posting please read [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) on how to post a proper bug report.
